feed.title: Alabama Reflector
feed.description: Latest news from the Alabama Reflector
feed.author: Alabama Reflector

items.title: States are quietly cutting child care funding — and families are out of options
items.description: For the past year, families in need of child care assistance in Indiana have been sitting on a waitlist — with no end in sight.

items.title: US Supreme Court temporarily blocks November SNAP payments
items.description: The U.S. Supreme Court temporarily blocked Friday night a lower court’s order that the Trump administration pay for a full month of food benefits.

items.title: Alabama lawmakers discuss new healthcare funding proposal
items.description: The Alabama legislature is expected to debate a new healthcare funding plan next week.

items.title: Montgomery officials celebrate new downtown revitalization effort
items.description: City leaders say the project could bring hundreds of jobs and new housing opportunities.
